wikipedia_page.main: Robert "Robbie" Karl Grabarz (born 3 October 1987) is a former British high jumper. He won a shared silver medal in the 2012 Olympics, which was upgraded from the original bronze after disqualification of the winner Ivan Ukhov of Russia in 2021.

response: At the 2012 Olympic Games, held in London, United Kingdom, on 7 August, Barshim won the bronze medal with a jump of 2.29, finishing in a 3-way tie for third place with Derek Drouin from Canada and Robert Grabarz from Great Britain.Men's High jump. . Retrieved on 8 August 2012.
